1.content:
BZZZZZZZT!!!!

A loud, piercing noise echoed through your dreams, and you awoke hastily to shut off the annoying alarm clock beside your bed, slamming your fist onto it, shutting off the noise."Blugh..."With a sigh you rolled out of bed, wiping the sleep from your eyes. For the most part, your home was dark, but you liked that. As you stumbled around, you managed to grab a bowl of cereal from the kitchen, spilling milk almost everywhere but your bowl, amble your way to your favorite chair and plop down into it, turning on the television. It was the news channel giving the regular feed of your boring old town. Coal exports, the weather, and some anti-anthro rally later this afternoon lead by the Mayor himself. Man, you hated that guy. But you could do nothing about it, so you simply rammed more sugary flakes into your mouth.

You got dressed in a simple tee, jeans, sneakers, and walked outside, enjoying the bright sunlight. Maybe today would be good. You looked out across the landscape, gargantuan houses bigger than you could comprehend around you, some houses as small as yours, but not that many. You lived in a neighborhood of giant, anthropomorphic animals.

But...you had forgotten how big they were. You always lost track of that.
1.title: Wake Up

111.content:
You groggily remember that you had to do something... what that was seemed to ellude you at the moment. Lost in thought you finally remembered! You had to visit one of your neighbors today! They said they needed your help with something.

That's the thing though, your neighbors are predominantly Anthro, so what could you (of all people) do to help 1 mile tall creatures?? That was the $1 Million Question.

Who are you visiting?
111.title: Visting neighbors

1111.content:
You remember now, this was the day you visit Meena, the girl next door, if the girl next door was a mile high bat girl. Technically, next door was an inaccurate depiction, your house was practically in her yard given your size different. You heard Meena was panicking and worried about something. Meena was very shy and nervous for an anthro, even to you.

As you walk towards her door you let out a sigh. You see the doorbell that Meena installed at the bottom of the door just for you. As you press the button, you hear crashing. "Coming!" yelled Meena. You let out another sigh. Meena probably forgot to put her glasses on again. Bat anthros had really poor eyesight. But then Meena walks up to the door and opens it. You look up to see Meena's silver fur covered body. She was very petite, especially compared to the pudgy cow girl Betty and that buxom vixen Vixie, but Meena was still beautiful. You knew she was a bat girl, but you didn't know what kind. You didn't know if she was a fruit bat or vampire bat. Today she was wearing a pair of blue jeans and ironically, a shirt with a yellow bat girl symbol. Meena was a big nerd when it came to pop culture.

"H-Hello?" asks Meena. "Alan? Is that you?" You didn't see Meena's face, it was too high, so you didn't know if she was wearing her glasses or not. "Down here!" you yell. "I'm down here Meena." "Oh! Hi, Alan, Oh thank you, thank you, thank you. Thank goodness you're here." "No sweat Meena, what's the word?"

Meena actually looked nervous and bit on her fingers. "Alan, I need you to..."
1111.title: The Bat Girl Next Door

"I need help finding my glasses." she said, blushing as she knelt down to get a better look. "I think I might've dropped them somewhere, but I can't see that well. And don't want to take apart my home just to find them... ya know?"

Chuckling, you patted her foot. "Sure! Where do you think they might've fallen?" you asked as your neighbor gently picked you up.

"I think they might have fallen under the couch... or the coffee table. I was taking a nap on the couch after a long day of gaming and well... now i can seem to find them anymore." she said, sighing nervously. Her heart was beating pretty fast as she careful walked into the living room. Unlike his other neighbor's house, Lalonde's 'pink palace', this living room looked quite normal.

Well normal except for the fact that it was all GIGANTIC.

There was a blue couch with holes in it, a brown recliner chair, Meena's beanbag chair, their widescreen tv, and so on. You used to come over and play video games with Meena when the two of you were younger. Great times.

The lovely bat set you next to the couch. Already from your vantage point you could tell that her glasses weren't under the coffee table. "Just leaves the couch then." you say, waving up to her before going under the monolithic piece of furniture. It was dusty, dark, hot and smelled of wet matted hair.

"Everything okay done there?" asked the cute bat from above.

"Yeah! I'm doing fine." you replied as you stumbled about in the dark. After what felt like fifteen minutes, you finally emerge from underneath the couch. Covered in dust and sweat... but no glasses. They weren't down there.

"Couldn't find them Meena." you grumbled, brushing off lint and other things off your clothes before turning back towards your host. Meena was...

"Say what?!" you yell. Meena then lowered her hand and you jumped into her palm before she took you up to her giant blue glasses covered eyes. Each eye big as a moon to you. "Please Alan, I can explain?" "Why would you want me to pretend to be your boyfriend?" you ask. Meena lets out a sigh. "My mom is visiting me on Earth. She thinks that I need to settle down soon. She wants me to get a boyfriend as soon as she can." Meena then pounds her head on the wall, forcing you to hide in her enormous bat ear. I can't lie to your mom and neither can you. Why not just tell her you aren't looking for anyone right now." "Come on Alan," says Meena giving you her best puppy dog eyes. "Please. It won't be that long." "But won't your Mom care if I'm a human?"

Meena lets out a scoff. "At this point, as long as you're male, she won't care." You let out a sigh. "Okay." Meena brings you to her mouth and smooches you making you scream as you're drenched in bat saliva. Then you hear a knock. "Oh," says Meena. "That's here. Just act natural." You shake your head. Meena walks up to the door and you look out the keyhole to see that Meena's mom looked a lot like her daughter except with a bigger bust and reddish hair. How old was she? She looked even hotter than her daughter.

But Meena said her mom might have brought a male guest to woo her daughter. Did she?

There's never anyone else here." she says, emphasizing the last part. Meena clears her throat. "Well actually mom, my boyfriend is here." she tells her mother. The older batwoman looks shocked. I'm just happy you finally found someone to settle down with!" she answers happily. "Hello Alan, I'm Meena's mother, Martha." she says to you politely. 1111211.title: we're going to spend the whole day together!

she notices him in the last second
11112112.content:
Within minutes, the three soon made there way out of the house and straight towards town. Judging by how fast Meena's mother was walking, it was clear that she was extremely excited about spending time with her daughter. As they walked past the plethora of shops aligning the streets, Alan casually sat upon Meena's palm as her and her mother began talking with one another. While it did seem odd that he was acting the part as the giant bat girls lover, he just hoped that he managed to play the part convincingly enough for the older bat to believe.

"So tell me Alan, how did you know about my dear little Meena?" Her mother asks as her eyes beamed down at the human's tiny body.

"h-huh?" Alan stammers unsure of how to exactly answer the question without making it sound absurd. "w-well, Meena just happened to be my neighbor." He states while trying to come up with some lie in order to make the claim sound even more believable.

"Is that so?" her mother asks while giving a large smile. "So I take it you two started out with some sort of puppy love?"

"Exactly!" Meena quickly answers before Alan even had the chance to tell his own made up tale. "We knew each other for quite some time, and soon enough we ended up becoming lovers" Meena smiles warmly down at her human companion. "Isn't that Right Alan Sweetie?"

"R-Right!" Alan quickly nods his head while looking up at Meena. "How could I forget about all those times we secretly hinted about dating?" he quickly adds.

"Oh! well you must tell me about your experiences when we head back home!" Her mother requests as she lets out a chuckle.

Both Meena and Alan return a chuckle, but not in the same pleased state as the bat woman. The two awkwardly gazed upon each other as their eyes displayed complete uncertainty over the matter. Just what type of stories could they possibly make up to appear like sweethearts? The doubtful thoughts soon vanished as the group stopped in front of a large building at the corner of a street.

"Here we are!" Meena's mother beamed proudly as she stood before what looked like an extremely fancy building. The ornate decorations and overall regal appearance of the structure could have easily been mistaken as some sort of home for an aristocrat, if it wasn't for the restaurant's name located right over the front doors.

"Mom? you want to eat here!?" Meena stammers surprised by her mothers choice of cuisine. "I mean..you do know how pricey this place is right?"

"Oh come now Meena!" her mother laughs at her daughters utter surprise. "it's been ages since I've seen you, so we minus will celebrate in a memorable fashion."

Not wanting to ruin the moment, and unsure if her mother would even take her urges into consideration, Meena slowly nods her head. "a-alright then." Within moments the three enter the regal establishment where they are quickly greeted by a ram garbed in the typical showy attire.

"Good evening." he spoke in a rather esteemed manner as he gazed upon the two bats while standing stoically upon a wooden platform. "A table for two?" he asks while looking upon the small party.

"Actually three." Meena corrects as she lifts Alan up to view in front of the ram. The calm expression on his face soon dissipated as he looked down in surprise at the miniscule human being. "e-errr...of course." he nods while clearing his throat. Judging by his sudden state of shock, this fancy restaurant must've been exclusive to anthros...that or this was the first time a human entered such a building. "Right this way please." he politely orders as he led the three to a small table located at the side of the restaurant. As soon as the three were seated, a Lynx waitress soon walked up to the three focusing her gaze down at Alan. "errr...do forgive me." she speaks in a soft yet uncertain voice. "but, this is the first time we really had...well, a human within this restaurant."

"Is that a negative thing?" Meena's mother asks with a scowl.

"Oh no! not at all!" quickly replies the Lynx. "well...it's just..." she stammers trying to find the correct words to speak. "we don't seem to have the right accommodations for...his size." she answers. "our utensils and glasses are all meant for anthros, so we don't really have anything that would be appropriate for somebody this small...err no offense." she quickly turns to Alan abashed. "none taken he replies."

"So...are you suggesting that we leave?" The Bat woman asks as she was now having second thoughts about her meal choice.

"Oh, Of course not!" The Lynx answers. "it's just that...well...this is quite an unexpected predicament for us."

Meena looks down at Alan as a smile soon formed on her face. "so you're saying that you have nothing his size?" to which the Lynx slowly nods her head. "well...will it be alright if he shared with me then?" Meena asks while turning her gaze up at her. "that can be arranged." the Lynx nods once more. "Great! then me and him will be sharing a meal." Alan was surprised that Meena would be so willing as to share her own food with him. "you have no complaints about that? right Alan?" Meena looks down while gently rubbing his head. "None what so ever." Alan replies while smiling. "alright then, may I ask what you two would like to drink?"

After giving the drink order to the waitress, she soon took her leave. "I'm so sorry about this Alan." Meena's mother apologizes as an ashamed expression soon grew on her face. "if I would have known, I would have chose some place else."

"No need to worry." Alan smiles while looking upon her. "it's perfectly fine."

Within moments the Lynx soon returns holding two glasses of water for the group. "Here you are." she smiles while handing the two beverages to the bats. "Now what can I get you all to eat?"

"I'll have the roast meat with sautéed vegetables, drizzled with a hint of herbs please?" Meena's mother answers. Judging by how she ordered her meal, this wasn't the first time she ate at some elegant establishment.

"Of course! and as for you two?" The waitress turns and looks at Meena.

"we'll have the Fettuccine Alfredo please." Meena answers. While it did sound like such a common choice to make within such a fancy restaurant, it did seem like the easiest thing for Alan and her to share.

"Very well, it will be out shortly." The Lynx nods and leaves the two to talk.

When the waitress did say that the food would come out shortly, she actually did mean it. In just minutes, the food was prepared and set right before the three. "here you are! enjoy your meals." she says with a big grin on her face as she soon walked off to tend to another table.

Within seconds, the three then began to proceed eating there meals. As Alan knelt on the side of the plate to look down at the massive pond of pasta, he turned his head to glance at the older bat. It surely did seem like Meena's mother was quite adept when it came to high class. His attention was quickly disturbed as a sudden movement caused him to fall straight within the patch of noodles and cream sauce. As he tried to stand up on the slippery surface, he soon felt another odd movement surrounding him. In moments he was soon raised upwards, along with a batch of noodles. As he turned his head to the side, the view of Meena's approaching open maw took over his sight.
11112112.title: Get a bite to eat

1111212.content:
"I'm going to be staying here for a few days!" she says with a smile. Meena doesn't share her joy. "What?! You didn't tell me you'd be staying over!" she almost shouts at her mother. "I didn't? I thought I did. Thats why I didn't bring a suitor this time." She tells the agitated Meena. "Good thing too, since you already have such a cute little guy!" She rubs your head with her giant finger as she says this, causing Meena to pull you closer to her. "Now let me just go get my bags."

She ten brings you in for a kiss, covering you once again in her saliva. Its at that point that her mother reenters the room. "Whoa, slow down you two!" she says teasingly.

Meena quickly wipes the saliva from your face with her finger. "Sorry Alan." she says. "No problem." you tell her. "This is normal, we are a couple after all." Even though you're just acting, this causes Meena to blush. "Well," her mother interrupts, lowering her face to you. "How did you two meet?" You look up at her. "We met when I moved into the neighborhood. I actually live out front." You explain. "Oh thats your house out there?" she asks. "It must be nice living so close together. I'll bet you stay the night a lot." she adds suggestively. "Yes!" Meena blurts out suddenly. "He was even thinking about staying here tonight!" she says as if trying to prove a point. You quickly look at her and she looks at you with pleading eyes. What will you do?
1111212.title: I'll be staying here for a few days!

You had to admit, you always DID like Meena, she was cute... kind... and sexy. You found yourself enjoying this prospect the more and more you played along. You nodded in agreement, this made the batgirl's mother chirp with excitement. You began to think that, perhaps, Meena was liking the idea of you two being an item as well.

111121211.content:
"What would you two like for dinner?" her mother asks."Mom, let me handle it. You're a guest." Meena protests. Her mother shakes her head. "I'll do it dear, its been a while since I've cooked for you." Meena and her mom argue for a little while and eventually decide to both cook. "Aren't you the lucky one Alan?" her mom says. "Two beautiful women cooking you breakfast." Meena gives her mother a look while blushing slightly.

The two of them begin preparing dinner while you watch. As you observe them you really notice how much they look alike. You can't help it but your eyes eyes are drawn to the more mature form of Meena's mom. Meena catches you staring at her mother and pouts a little. You quickly look away, feeling guilty. When the food is done, you see that they've prepared a meal of different fruit dishes. Guess you finally know what kind of bat she is now.

The two gigantic batwomen sit down at the table. Meena pulls you closer to her, a lot closer. "A little possessive, dear?" her mother asks. "Relax, I'm not going to take him from you." Meena ignores her mother and offers you a slice of orange. Well, a tiny piece of a slice of orange. "Here you go Alan!" she says. You take it and find that its delicious. These anthros must grow their fruit differently because its better than any other orange you've ever had. Meena has looks like she's lost in a dream as she feeds you. Her mother watches and smiles. "Alan, do you know how much Meena loves fruit?" You look up at her and she continues. "When she was a little girl she was quite chubby. She would always eat so much fruit that I called her my little fruit cup!" Meena chubby? You inadvertently imagine Meena with a body like Betty's. You find yourself blushing while Meena tries to quiet her mother. Once dinner is over, what next?
111121211.title: Dinner Time

1111212111.content:
After the meal Meena and her mother clean up and the three of you head to the living room. They sit down and Meena places you on her lap. You look at the massive legs that stretch out before you and then up at the giant bat that they belong to. Meena looks down at you and smiles. Her mother breaks the silence and starts a conversation.

"So, tell me how the two of you got together. I've been trying for what seems like forever to get Meena to settle down with a man." she says. You and Meena have a brief panicky moment as you try to come up with a story. "Well, I moved into the neighborhood and wanted to meet my new neighbors." you tell her. "Me and Meena got acquainted and something just clicked." The older batwoman seems to accept this. "Well I'm glad she found someone so nice." she says. "And you're just the cutest little guy!" she adds as she rubs your head with her finger. Meena swats her mothers hand away, causing her to chuckle. She gives the two of you a smile.

Meena's mom then leaves the room and tells the two of you she'll be back. When she's gone, Meena breathes a sigh of relief and brings you to her face. "Thank you! Thank you!" she whispers and covers you in kisses. You wipe yourself off, but still enjoy the attention. Truth be told, you're kind of enjoying this whole thing. At that moment Meena's mom returns with something in her hand. What is it?
1111212111.title: Family Time

11112121111.content:
Meena's mother reenters the room with a bottle in her hand. When she sits down you see that its wine. "I brought this so the two of us could relax a little Meena, but now I guess it can be a present in honor of your relationship!" she says cheerfully. Meena rolls her eyes. "Are you sure about this Mom?" Her mother puts her arm around her shoulder. "Of course dear! We should unwind after the day we've had! I just found out that my little girl has a cute boyfriend, and he just met his future mother in law! I'd say quite a bit has happened." You and Meena glance at each other when she says "mother in law", Meena turning red as she does so.

"Mom!" she says. Her mother opens the bottle and pours two glasses. "See, you're too tense. You need to unwind a little." she tells her daughter and passes her one of the glasses. Meena looks at you and you give her an encouraging smile. What could go wrong? Meena takes the glass and begins taking small sips. Her mother however is less reserved and takes big drinks. Meena tips her glass and lets a few drops fall to the table for you to drink. You don't really drink too often, so you try not to have too much.

As time goes on the two batwomen begin to feel the effects of the wine. They're getting rather tipsy. Meena is giggling as her mother downs another glass. "So tell me, what are the odds of a cutie like you getting with a lady like me?" the older woman asks as she lowers her face down to you. With her so close you can smell the wine on her breath. Hell, she's so big its like the wind itself smells like wine! You don't get a chance to answer as you feel yourself being snatched up. "No way, he's mine!" Meena says with a pout. She follows up with a barrage of kisses. You have to admit you enjoy it, but again the smell of wine is assaulting you.

In the midst of Meena's kisses you get a surprise as you feel her tongue snake out and begin licking you all over. This is getting serious. Meena finishes her tasting of you and lays on her back with a satisfied moan. You find yourself tumbling onto her chest. While it may not be big by her standards, its still massive to you. A shadow is suddenly cast over you and you look up to see Meena's mother crawling over towards you. She gets closer until she's practically on top of her daughter. So here you are, laying on the bosom of your gigantic fake girlfriend as her mother is looming over the two of you. To top it off they're both drunk. Where does this lead?
11112121111.title: Time To Unwind

111121211112.content:
The shadow of Meena's mother is cast over you. You're laying on Meena's chest as her drunken mom looms overhead. You don't know exactly what she's going to do. Before she can do anything though, she begins to fall. You can't do anything as she descends on top of you. When she lands she's laying on top of her daughter sleeping. You realize that there are two people snoring and that Meena must have passed out too. Her mothers plump breasts are pressed up against her more petite ones, with you caught in the middle.You hear their booming snores from your prison of flesh.

Some time later the two batwomen wake up and rub their heads. "Oh that doesn't feel good." Meena's mom says. Meena rubs her own head and nods. "Wait," she says. "Where's Alan?" She begins to search around frantically until her mother feels something a little strange. She feels around on her left breast and finds you stuck to it. She peels you off with a laugh and calls Meena. "I found him! He was a little too comfortable on my boob." Meena rushes over and grabs you from her mother. She hugs you to her with that hint of possessiveness again. Her mother just gives a smirk.

After the three of you get yourselves straight its time for bed. You all spent a good chunk of the evening sleeping. The women because of the wine, you because you had no choice. You were all still tired so you decide to properly go to sleep. Do you shower first, or just go right to bed?
111121211112.title: Caught In The Middle

But Meena and Martha wouldn't hear it. One of them offered to take you into the shower with them.

Who?
1111212111121.title: Shower Time!

It was Lily! The resident goth girl amongst the anthros. With her large black leather boots, she barely felt you bump into her. The catgirl was casually sifting through a book about vampire lore. Lily must've sensed you, as she gave a half-hearted "excuse me." without looking up from her book. Closing it, and returning the book to it's shelf, she looked down at you.

"Oh... hi... Alan." she said, cracking a slight smile as her studded tail flicked.

"Uhhh... hi Lily. Haven't seen you around much. How're things?" you asked, nervous. You always had a thing for goth girls, and now the sexy queen of them was standing over you. You hoped she couldn't notice you blushing.

"Ehhh... you know... doing well. You??" she asked. This was the most either of you had ever said to each other. You tell her you're doing well also, and if she had any good book suggestions? This sudden interest in her seemed to amuse Lily.

"Eh... there's the Dark Hunter chronicles... the Esoteric Gospel Rites... stuff like that." none of those were really hitting ya. Without a word the giant shecat leaned down and picked you up gently, bringing you closer to her eyes.

"Is that a David Morsoe book?? The kind of mystery story that old housewives read??" she asked, grinning. Nervously you explain why you were there, getting things for your folks. Her grin turned into a smile. "That's really sweet of you Alan." she said as she placed you on her shoulder.

"I'll help you get through the line." she offered. You were, quite frankly, speechless. You and Lily never so much as did anything more than share a brief moments of eye contact. Nervously, you thanked her and held onto the black hoodie she wore.

A few minutes later, and the two of you were outside the bookstore. "So... Lily... got anything planned for today?" you hazarded to ask. Now it was her turn to look shocked. "Uhh... not much.... really. Was just going to go....."
11322.title: Lily, the Goth Cat

choices: Lily offers to let you be her pet again, completely serious this time
The manager of the restaurant comes in.
113221.content:
"I was just gonna go have lunch... Would you like to join me?" Lily asked with a playful grin.

Your heart skipped a beat. Lily, the most beautiful goth girl you had ever seen, was inviting you to have lunch with her. This was like a dream come true.

"Sure Lily, I'd love to join you." You said nervously, trying to hide your face so she didn't see you blushing.

"Well alright then, pipsqueak! Climb aboard!" Lily said, reaching down her index finger for you to climb on.

With butterflies in your stomach you climbed back onto Lily's finger and let her lift you into the air. This time, however, she didn't put you onto her shoulder. Instead she dropped you on top of her head, and you were lost in a jungle of her ebony fur. Looking around, you noticed that you were right next to one of her massive ears.

"Since I'm gonna be giving you a ride, you're gonna have to do something for me in return. How about you give me a scratch behind the ear and we'll call it even." Lily said teasingly while gently ruffling your hair with her fingertip.

"Sure thing, Lily. So, where are we going to eat?"

"I know this amazing place that serves the best fish you'll ever taste. They even carry human and anthro sized servings. Trust me, you'll love it."

Lily then began walking, and as the ground below you shook with her footsteps, you took it as your cue to start scratching her ear. As you did it, you heard Lily start purring.

"Oh yeah, that's the spot. Keep it up, little guy. I might just want to keep you as my own little pet. Then I could have you do things like this for me every day." Lily said jokingly.

You both laughed, though secretly you wouldn't mind being kept as a pet by Lily. She was always nice to you, albeit a bit on the playful side. She was also beautiful beyond words, and being surrounded by her fur like this gave you a warm relaxing feeling. It was almost as though this was where you belonged. Being able to spend every day with Lily, getting to interact with her beautiful body on a daily basis, it would be perfect. Eventually you got so absorbed in those thoughts that you didn't even notice when you arrived at the restaurant. It wasn't until Lily poked you in the back with her claw that you stopped scratching her ear and snapped back to reality.

"Hey shrimp, you can stop now. We're here." Lily said with a giggle.

Blushing, you climbed aboard Lily's massive finger and let her carry you in her palm. She walked up to the woman at the counter, a petite mouse girl with glasses, and began to speak.

"Hey there Suzy, long time no see."

"Lily, it's been ages! How have you been?" The mouse girl asked, sounding excited to see Lily again.

"Eh, I've been fine. A little rough patch here and there, but nothing really worth complaining about. And you?"

"I've been doing great! I can't thank you enough for helping me get this job! You're the best friend a mouse could ask for!"

"And that's some fearsome irony, isn't it?" Lily said with a chuckle.

"Yeah, well, what brings you here today?" Suzy asked, adjusting her glasses.

"I'm just here to get a bite to eat. Can you show me to a table?"

"Of course. One anthro table, coming right up!"

"That's one anthro and one human, thank you. I'm here with a little friend of mine." Lily said, holding out her palm to let her friend see you. You smiled and waved at her.

"Oh, I'm so sorry sir! I didn't even see you there! Okay then, two tables coming up." Suzy said.

Suzy then lead the way to an open table and gestured for Lily to sit down. Lily took her seat and placed you on top of the table. You then watched as Suzy reached into her pocket and pulled out a much smaller table and chair, one that was made to fit someone of your scale. She carefully put the smaller table on top of the main one, right in front of Lily, and waited for you to take your seat as well.

"So then, what will you be having today?" Suzy asked, looking at Lily.

"I'm in the mood for tuna today." Lily replied.

"And you, sir?" Suzy asked, looking down at you.

"I'll have what she's having." You said, smiling up at Lily.

"Alright then. Two tunas, coming right up!" Suzy said as she walked away.

Soon the mouse girl returned with two trays carrying tuna. One was massive to feed an anthro like Lily, and the other was tiny enough for a human like you to eat. Suzy walked away, and the two of you began to eat. Lily wasn't kidding, the fish at this place was amazing. Throughout the course of the lunch, you and Lily did a lot of talking. It was a truly amazing experience for you. You wished that this could last forever, but soon enough you both finished your fish and the lunch was over.

Before you left, however...
113221.title: Lunchtime with the queen of all goths

choices: "Sure Lily, I'd love to be your pet!"
"Sorry Lily, but I'm not sure I really want that... I think I'll pass for now."
1132211.content:
You were just getting ready to pay your half of the bill and leave, but Lily scooped you up in her palm and lifted you up in front of her face. You were so close that you could feel her breath, and the scent of the tuna she just ate was still fresh.

"Hey little guy, remember how I said I might make you my pet?" Lily asked with a playful smirk.

"Uh, yeah... Why?"

"Well, back then I was just kidding. But after spending so much time getting to know you, I really think that I'd like that after all. So I'm gonna give you a choice. Do you want to be my pet? We can have lots of fun together, and I'll take real good care of you. I promise that you'll enjoy every minute of it."

You didn't know how to respond. This was just so sudden. Earlier you were thinking about how nice it would be to be Lily's pet, but now you were really being given that opportunity! But was it really what you wanted?

How do you reply?
1132211.title: Lily's offer

11322111.content:
After spending some time with the massive feline, you couldn't help but muster a small smile at her request. She surely did seem like a friendly caring person, despite her somewhat intimidating appearance.

"Sure Lily." you reply with a nod and smile upon her massive palm. "I think it would be a great idea to spend some time with you."

Lily's eyes looked as if they would pop out of her socket by the unexpected reply. "r-really?" she stammers with a shocked yet joyful expression on her face. "you'd really like to be my pet?" she asks once more, wondering if you were being completely serious about the answer or simply pulling her leg.

"Why not?" you reply while giving a small shrug and large smile. After all you did with her today, you would gladly take the opportunity to hang out with her more, even if this meant being considered as a pet.

Lily's smile only seemed to grow wider by the confirmation as she slowly raised you upwards towards her massive cheek. Gently, she caressed you against her soft warm fur, as a low purr soon began emanating from within her throat.

"Thank you." she says in a soft, quiet voice. "I promise you'll enjoy staying with me."

"I believe you Lily." you reply as you gladly accept the friendly nuzzle she was giving you.
11322111.title: "Sure Lily, I'd love to be your pet!"

choices: A laid back squirrel girl who is friends with Lily and loves humans.
A snobby poodle girl who doesn't like Lily and hates humans.

choices: Lily runs into a friend first
113222.content:
"I was just gonna go home Alan," says Lily. "Want to tag along." Lily even purrs as she gestures at you. "Uh sure," you say. "I'll just tell my mom that I ran into a friend." Lily purrs louder and then gets on her knees before picking you up and placing you in her hair.

"Hang on tight," she says. "And don't mess it up. I just got it the way I like it." "Oh, okay Lily." "Oh, and by the way. Be careful. My family can get a little wild." Soon, Lily and you pay for your books and then walk out of the book store. You couldn't believe it. You were on top of an anthro, and a hot goth girl at that. However her head was practically a forest, each strand of hair and fur thicker than any tree on planet Earth, native to Earth that is. You even see a hairclip that looked big enough to land airplanes on and then you get up and see a view of Coalton Shores. It was awesome. You could even see your house from atop this cat girl giantess. However, its also cold up there, so you have to get to lower, furrier ground, but then you slip and fall into her ear, grabbing the sides. You even step in some earwax and let out a groan. "Yuck." You say."

Then you duck because Lily puts one of her titanic fingers in the same ear to clean it and you have to crawl under her massive digit. Lily smirks as she hears you yell and scurry. "Be careful up there Alan, it's a long way down." You let out a sigh and then nod your head a few times.

What happens now?
113222.title: To the House of Cats

1132221.content:
"Heads up Alan," says the titanic goth cat. "We're here." You look forward to see Lily's house... well... it wasn't like any human house you'd ever seen. For one, on the side of the house there was a purple anime style cat's face on the side. There were also stepping stones up to the door that were shaped like paw prints. There were also titanic cat condos at the side in place of stairs to the upper floor.

On top of the house was a weathervane shaped like a cat chasing a canary. "Wow," you say. "Lily. It's not at all what I expected from you." Lily just lets out a purr and shrugs her shoulders as she shakes you down onto one of them. "What exactly do you expect?" "Of course." You say. You take it that mile high cats are still cats.

Lily walks forward and then you realize something. With the bright colors and Lily's gothic fashion sense, it didn't make sense. "Lily," you say. "You don't live alone do you?" Lily just shook her head and let out a sigh as she opens the door. "'Fraid I ain't the only kitty under this roof."
1132221.title: The House of Cats

114.content:
Before you could ponder what to do today, your phone rings loudly. "Huh?" You decide to answer the phone. "Hello?" "Hey Al Man," said a familiar voice on the phone. "Guess who?" "Kevin? Dude. Haven't seen you in a while." "What's it like living in anthro town?" As you're talking, you hear footsteps and see Meena, or rather, her feet walking by you. "It's something." "Man," said Kevin. "You're treading in dangerous waters Alan. But so am I." "Excuse me?" Kevin lets out that laugh of his, while not as loud as Reggie's, you hear it clearly. "Guess who just bagged one?" You were confused as to what Kevin was talking about when you realized something. "Hold on! You mentioned last time you were trying one of those computer chosen dates, don't tell me you're dating an anthro." "Uh-huh. The 'little' woman wanted to see my friend in the big city. See you later."

As you hang up on Kevin, you can't wrap your head around the fact that he actually was dating a mile high anthro. What made it stranger was that he neglected to tell you what kind. You thought about dating the anthro women in your neighborhood, but you chickened out on asking all the girls you knew out because of the obvious size difference.

That was when you heard a stomping noise and gulp loudly. "Don't tell me that goofball is here already." Exactly what kind of anthro was that girlfriend Kevin told you about?

You decide to walk outside and when you do, you let out a scream because you look up and see Kevin somehow levitating in the air waving down on you. "Hey dude." "Kevin?! What the... how... how are you doing that?! And I thought you said you were bringing a girlf..." Before you could finish that last word, Kevin let out a laugh and you hear someone else laughing with him, a female voice and a loud one at that.

Suddenly something appeared, a giant anthro carrying Kevin on her shoulder. She was a mile high chameleon girl wearing black stockings and a short skirt along with a rainbow striped sweater. This chameleon girl also had bright pink hair that reached down to her long curled up tail. You walked back slightly as Kevin's chameleon girlfriend looked down on you. "Oh man! I love that trick!" "What's up Al man." "What the heck Kevin! You nearly gave me a heart attack! A chameleon, really?" Kevin gave you a smug smile. "Alan, meet Milan." Milan then held out the tip of one of her clawed fingers and you nervously shake it. You let out a nervous laugh. "So Kev..." you say as you moved your head to look at your friend. "Answer me this..."

"What brings you two to Coalton Shores?" You then let out a scream as Milan grabs you both with her tongue and takes you into her humongous mouth. You begin to panic but Kevin rubs your shoulder. Milan lets out a thunderous laugh and being directly in her mouth you have to cover your ears. "Like Kev said. I wanted to see Coalton Shores. I must say, you're exactly how Kevin described you. "And how would that be?!" Milan flicks out her tongue and tosses you and Kevin into her palm. Kevin lets out a laugh. "Isn't she a riot?" "That's one word for her." "Well Al, I introduced you to my anthro girl." "Don't you have some friends in my height class?" asks Milan as she wiggles her tongue. "Kev wanted to see how the anthro side of town's been treating you." You let out a laugh. "Well, I guess we could introduce your girlfriend to the neighbors."

Suddenly Milan's body begun to glow in all sorts of colors. She turns red and then yellow and then pink and blue and violet and even checkered. Kevin lets out a whistle. "That's why I love this chick. She's made of surprises." You let out a sigh. This girlfriend was not getting on your good side. But you had to introduce her to someone. Which neighbor do you visit first?

We'd like to ask you to accompany us on a double date with Cleo's friend.

As you walk outside you see Kevin walking forward. "Hi Alan," he said. "Dude. It's been too long." "Uh, hi," you say to your friend. "Hi Kevin. You said something about your girlfriend." "Yeah, isn't that what I just told you. Cleo, I want you to meet my friend Alan." It was there you look up and look in shock at a large black furred jackal woman looking at you. Cleo looked taller than an average anthro and that was quite a feet in itself. She also had hieroglyphs tattooed all over her body and two earrings shaped like anhks. She was dressed just like a sorceress and had bright green eyes and long blue hair that reached past her butt and nearly hit the ground. She sorta looked like Anubis.

You were speechless but Cleo didn't speak either. Instead, she smiles and waves down at you, showing you her massive teeth. You don't want to be rude, so you wave back at your friend's girlfriend. "A carnivore eh?" you asked. "You always liked to live dangerously man." Kevin lets out a laugh and gives you a mild push. "Don't be a wuss. Carnivores are the best kind." It was here Cleo picked both of you up and placed you on her shoulder. Still smiling and still not talking. That sort of made you nervous.

"She doesn't say much does she Kevin?" "Yeah," said Kevin. "Tell me about it. Ouch!" Cleo pokes Kevin on the back with one of her claws and gives her boyfriend a slight glare. "Hey, I'm not criticizing beautiful." You let out a laugh. "Careful Kevin, it's easier to get in the dog house when you're dating a dog the size of a highway. Ouch!" Cleo poked you too and actually begun to growl slightly. Kevin took this opportunity to whisper something important to you. "Cleo doesn't like being called a dog. She's a jackal." "Oops, I'm terribly sorry Cleo. Won't happen again." Cleo just smiles to signify she forgives you. "So Kevin, why come to town with a huge do... jackal in tow?" Kevin clears his throat before giving you the answer.
1142.title: Jackal

11422.content:
"Cleo's got a friend here in town, nobody you know, and she's looking for a man of her own. There's an awesome new restaurant in town and well..." "Wait Kev," you say. "You want me to be her date?" Cleo smiles and nods her head.

You hesitate before you decide to ask Kevin more about Cleo's friend. "She isn't another jackal is she?" Kevin lets out a laugh. "No way dude. You wish you were cool enough to score a jackal." You let out a grunt and give a glare at your friend. "Where do we meet." "There's an Egyptian styled restaurant called Nile Moors. See you at eight. Come on Cleo. We gotta go tell Patty we scored her a date. See you later Al. With that, Cleo puts you down and walks off with her tiny boyfriend who she proceeds to place in her cleavage. That night you went to the restaurant, it looked a lot like a pyramid. It was obviously built for anthros given the size. Then you feel a hand on your shoulder. "Ah!" you yell. Then you turn around and see Kevin. "So you made it after all." "Kevin! Hey, where's Cleo." "Oh don't worry. She's coming." That was when you feel vibrations. Cleo was coming, but it was heavier than just Cleo, she was bringing over her friend and you look you to see that Cleo's friend Patty was...

114221.content:
You knew that anthros were big, but Patty was a particularly huge anthro. She was a tall grayish skinned Egyptian hippopotamus anthro with long blackish purple hair and a slight mole on the side of her face. She was wearing a purple striped dress and earrings similar to Cleo's own. Patty looks down and gives you a smile, showing her intimidating looking hippo fangs. I can tell, after all, I am the most beautiful anthro this side of Coalton Shores. Ah, why wait until the end of the night." By the time Patty spits you out, you're covered in lipstick and saliva. "Ugh." You groan. Kevin lets out a laugh as Cleo picks him up and places him on her shoulder. "Good luck with Patty Alan." Kevin lets out another laugh and holds out his hand as Cleo gives him a humongous high five. As Cleo and Kevin enter Nile Moors, Patty picks you up again and you let out a slight scream. "See that jackal carrying her man? When the night's over, that's going to be you and me." "Huh, what do you...Ah!" Before you can finish your sentence, Patty crams you deep into her cleavage. You can barely move and it's nothing but darkness. What's more is that its sticky and reeks of sweat. You're thinking "I am so going to kill Kevin when this night is over."

After a few minutes in Patty's monster sized breasts, you both arrive with Kevin and Cleo at a table. Cleo gestures to Patty to ask where you are. "Oh don't worry, it's not like I put him someplace where he'd fall and get crushed. Cleo reaches into her cleavage and places you on the table as you inhale deeply and Kevin walks up to you. "Got it," the waiter said. "Two diet sodas. Human sized and anthro sized." The waiter places a smaller table in front of you and Kevin, human sized of course. You realize at this point that Cleo might actually be mute. Kevin was dating an anthro that couldn't even speak.

But then you wonder. How did the waiter understand her. Then you realize something, all three anthros you've seen tonight at the restaurant were anthros of animals you'd normally find in Egypt. Your hippopotamus date lets out a giggle before pushing you against one of her mountain sized breasts. She seemed really intent on making you her boyfriend. You know a few female neighbors.

114221211.content:
The waiter returns to the table with your drinks, and asks for your food orders. Patty leans in close and whispers in his ear, confusing the rest of you. The waiter nods and heads off. You couldn't believe it. You were moving around town just like you were on a roller coaster. "Woohoo!" yells Kevin. "You go beautiful!" You didn't even know what Sonia fully looked like and she was taking you for a ride. Suddenly.
11431.title: Cheetah

choices: She doesn't stop until she reaches the ocean
114312.content:
You begin to fly off as Sonia turns and Kevin has to grab you by the hand to keep you from flying away. You grab hold of Kevin's back and Kevin climbs towards his girlfriend's neck. He clings to the back for wind resistance. "What happened?!" you yell. "Sonia turned around. She's in the next town over. Crystal Ridge." "What?! It's only been a minute!" Kevin lets out a scoff. "Cheetah, remember." "Doesn't she ever slow down!"

Kevin shakes his head. You let out a gulp. This cheetah probably didn't even know you were riding on her and she was moving like the Flash. You felt like you were gonna hurl but Kevin stopped you. "Don't you dare. I made that mistake and Sonia made me clean her toes for two weeks straight." You swallow and let out a grunt. "Hold on," says Kevin. "I'm gonna try to stop her." You hold onto Kevin tight as he crawls up to one of Sonia's ears. He inhales deeply and hollers "Stop!"

You hold onto Kevin tight in case that hyperactive girlfriend of Kevin's doesn't listen. What does Sonia do.
114312.title: Sonia turns and reaches the next town

choices: You three stay in the water
1143122.content:
You didn't think it was possible, but even though Kevin was right up to Sonia's ear, she didn't listen. Kevin lets out a groan. "What is it?" you ask. "This never worked before. Sonia's addicted to speed. At this rate she won't stop until she crashes." You let out a gulp and hold onto Kevin tight before you notice something, Sonia seemed to be slowing down, but the view was also getting lower.

"What's going...Glub!" Before you could say anything else, you and Kevin find yourselves underwater as Kevin lets go of Sonia's hair. Kevin swims up to the surface with you on his back and then you inhale deeply before coughing a few times. Kevin turns his head and lets out a sigh. "In the ocean again. Yep, that'll do it." Suddenly a huge wave comes up and blows the two of you across the water. You let go of Kevin and flip about before your head is finally in the light. You look up and see Sonia, a tall yellow furred cheetah girl with long strawberry blonde hair. She appeared to be wearing orange spandex as she gives an embarrassed look.

"Oops," said Sonia. "I did it again didn't I. Sorry Kevin. You know how I can't stop when I'm in motion." Sonia picks Kevin up out of the water and kisses him with her house sized lips as he lets out a grunt. "If I wasn't wet enough already. Sonia, this is my friend Alan. He kinda got chopped bad." You stagger as you swim up to Sonia. You're so tired Sonia has to lift her paw up under you to keep you afloat. "Hi Alan, I'm Sonia. Any friend of Kevin's is a friend of mine." You cough a few times. "It's okay. It was kinda fun actually." Sonia gives a smile at you, unintentionally showing you her giant intimidating fangs.
1143122.title: Splash Landing

choices: "I Dunno. I don't think Alan's up to it"
11431221.content:
Sonia decides to stay in the water as she places you and Kevin on her shoulder and swims through the ocean. Kevin takes off his shirt and hands it up on one of Sonia's giant earrings and you do the same as you both walk to the back of her neck.

"What is it with you and the girls you date Kevin?" you ask your friend. "So I like big girls. Sue me. Besides, you know you'd want to hit a gal like Sonia." You let out a nervous laugh. Kevin actually had a point. The anthro girls were all so big and beautiful, especially Lalonde, Vixie and Betty. Even Reggie and Meena were attractive in their own way. Heck, you even thought that criminal anthro Sapphira was hot, even though you'd never want to encounter her.

But then you realize what you were talking about and turn back to Kevin as he takes off his pants and reveals a bathing suit underneath. "Do you always wear a bathing suit beneath your pants?" "Duh, this isn't the first time that Sonia hit the water. At least this time it was the water. She hit a tree the other day and I wound up in the neighbor's bird bath. It didn't help that the neighbor was a giant parrot." You wonder how Kevin puts up with Sonia. He was dating a girl who moved at the speed of light and didn't come with seat belts.

"Hey Kev!" yells Sonia. "I bet I can swim sixty four laps around that island over there!" Sonia is pointing to an island tens of miles away from Coalton Shores. You gulp and then hide in Sonia's ear, knowing that you'd risk another bumping ride.

What does Kevin say?
11431221.title: Cheetah in the Water

choices: You fly off and land in the water
114312211.content:
"Heh, you're on Sonia," says Kevin. "This girl is a real daredevil." You panic. You barely survive that last bumpy ride. "You could've talked to me first Kevin!" you yell. "Wait a minute. This might not be so bad, maybe she can't swim as fast as she can run."

But you're wrong, so very wrong, Sonia takes off at lightspeed and Kevin and you have to hold onto the fur on the back of her neck as she goes around the island. In not even ten seconds she goes ten laps around the island. "Looks like I'm gonna make it Kev!" "We'll see about that Sonia, let's make it six hundred sixty four laps." "Kevin!!" you yell. "Ah!" Sonia is moving through the water so fast that you're being splashed by meteors of water. How could Kevin endure this. He may not be an anthro but he wasn't human if he could take all this.

The only question now was... could you take it?
114312211.title: Cheetah round the island

11432.content:
As you walk outside, you continue to hear anthro footsteps. All anthros had thunderous footsteps but these sounded big even for an anthro. Kevin's girlfriend must've been really big. "Kevin?" you ask.

Then the footsteps stop and you look up at a frightening sight. You look at a giant elephant anthro woman, African considering her tusks and she was bright pinkish brown with long silvery hair that was in a combination of a mohawk and ponytail and bright blue eyes. This elephant woman was wearing mostly black leather with fingerless gloves and had a tattoo of the continent African on her shoulder She was big all around being an elephant and all but even for an elephant she looked large as she looked down on you. "Are you Alan?" she asks in an African accent. "Y-yes." You reply. You had never encountered an anthro this big. She looked three times bigger than a normal anthro and her toe alone was bigger than your house.

The elephant woman lets out a laugh and then bends down. Before you can run away she lifts you up with her trunk and places you in her large navel where you meet your friend Kevin. "Hey Alan. I see you met Ivy. Don't worry, she's the biggest anthro I've ever seen but she's very friendly and funny." Ivy then lowers her trunk and sprays water at you and Kevin. "Most of the time." Grumbles Kevin. "And I thought the human girls you used to date were strange." You both share a laugh before Ivy lowers her trunk again. "Up, elevator's here." Said Kevin. Kevin then walks up to one of Ivory's open nostrils. You hesitate but Kevin then grabs you by the hand. "Hey, we're getting a lift to a better view. Come on."

You follow Kevin into his girlfriend's trunk, it's dark and slightly wet but you have no time to complain because Ivy is lifting you boys up. Where does this pachyderm girl take you.
11432.title: Big Girl You are Beautiful

114321.content:
Ivy takes her trunk down to her cleavage and digs it in before she snorts you and Kevin out. You let out a grunt as you're trapped between those fleshy mountains. You then let out a yell as Kevin pulls you down. "Kevin!" Kevin then blows on his finger. "Hold still man." "Like I have a choice?"

Ivy then begins to walk, jiggling her giant body. It was crowded in Ivy's cleavage and sweaty too. You try to wiggle your way out but Kevin grabs you. "Careful. Ivy's very ticklish." You let out a groan. "Kevin, I can't believe you. I mean, an elephant? She's massive even by anthro standards." "Big and Beautiful Alan. Big and Beautiful. She's big fun."

"But isn't it a little disgusting riding in her trunk. You look at your arm to see you're still covered in Ivy's mucus. "Don't be a baby. She'll just wash that off. She only forgot I was in there once. Thankfully she had some ipecac handy." Suddenly you begin to slip.

"Ah!" You slide down Ivy's belly and then grab hold of her navel piercing and climb up. "You okay down there Alan?" You begin to cringe and begin to crawl up and grab hold of Ivy's shirt. "Man," says Kevin. "You've got to be careful. You let out a groan. Suddenly Ivy comes to a complete stop. "Alright tiny guys," she says. "We're here. Thank you for riding with elephant airlines. "Oh no," you say. "Ah!

Ivy sucks you back into her trunk and then places it into her cleavage for Kevin to climb in. "What's going on?" "Oh," says Kevin. "Don't worry man. Ivy and I have got a great day planned for the three of us. Soon to be the four of us." "Huh." "You'll see soon."

Kevin gets in Ivy's trunk and Ivy pulls you both into the air where you get a good view and Ivy takes off her black jacket. But where are you?
114321.title: From Trunk to Bunk

1143211.content:
The two of you look out the trunk and reveal that Ivy had taken you both to the beach. Then you see Ivy removing her pants to reveal a bikini bottom underneath and that her shirt was actually the top. "Yep," says Kevin. "Looks like the real fun can begin. You ready to hit the water Allen." You let out a gulp before Kevin stripes down to a bathing suit and then Ivy exhales from her trunk, leaving both of you to come flying out of her nose to the water with a splash.

You let out a cough as you rise but then it gets even hairier. "Oh dear!" you yell. "Cannonball!" Ivy herself leaps into the water and creates a huge wave that pushes you and Kevin out to see before Kevin's pachyderm girlfriend swims up to you both and then sucks you towards her with her trunk. You and Kevin each grab one of the tips of each of her enormous tusks. "You gotta love this girl," says Kevin. "Can't keep an elephant away from the water." Ivy lets out another trumpet and then a laugh. "You got that right baby."

You let out a cough as you hold on Ivy's tusk tight. "What's the matter Al?" asks Ivy. "Never seen an anthro as big as me have ya?" You shake your head a few times. "Oh it's cool. I get that a lot. I'd say I'm one of the biggest anthro babes on this planet. Just wait'll you get to Zoonova." You shake. The idea that there were anthros bigger than this African pachyderm woman frightened you. You try not to focus too much on this elephant woman's massive size, but as she swims through the water, you see birds land on her back.

You gulp and try to change the subject. "So Kev," you say. "How did you and Ivy meet?" "Oh that?" asks Kevin. "I was camping on Zoonova a few months ago." "On Zoonova!? The anthro homeworld. Every inhabitant there is practically a city. What were you thinking?" "You know me Al, I like to live dangerously. Anyway, I walked into a cave as I was doing a little exploring." "Except it wasn't a cave baby," says Ivy. "I remember that, it was my nose. I was taking a little nap and my future BF wandered into my sniffer. Boy did he get a big surprise when I woke up." Kevin laughs with his jumbo sized jumbo girlfriend. "And Ivy sure got a surprise when she took a drink in a river. Much better than any water slide."

Ivy trumpets and sucks up more water before spraying it directly up in the air to create a miniature rainbow. "If he hadn't grabbed my uvula, I would've been the first carnivorous elephant on Zoonova. I love my man. He is so wiery." Then Ivy uses her trunk to place both you and Kevin on her back as she takes a little swim.
1143211.title: Pachyderm on the Beach

11432112.content:
After a while of swimming, Ivy swims back to the beach and holds out her trunk. "After you boys." You don't understand what she means but then Kevin grabs you by the hand and you both slide down her two thousand foot trunk. "Whoa!" you yell. Ivy even forms the end of her trunk into a spiral and you and Kevin hit the sand. As you get up, you're wet and covered in sand. Thankfully, Ivy blows a gust of wind from her nose and blows you both dry. "Thanks Ivy," says Kevin. "You're the best." Ivy lets out a laugh and you actually laugh as well. "That was," you say. "That was actually kind of fun."

Kevin smacks you on the back and laughs. "Ivy's a keeper. Dollars to donuts." Ivy then surfaces out of the water, her massive movements making small earthquakes and tidal waves. Several of the waves even knock down a few human surfaces before Ivy lets out a trumpet and then a laugh. You and Kevin laugh with Kevin's titan of a girlfriend until you both hear shaking. Loud shaking. You felt quakes from anthros before but this time they were similar to Ivy's own footsteps.

You then turn your head and look to see another elephant woman but gray skinned and since she didn't have tusks like Ivy, she was an Asian elephant. An Asian elephant with big red earrings along with a blue bikini body and red top with yellow highlights. She had long black hair that reached down to her moon sized rear. Ivy stops laughing and gets a good look at this second elephant. "Well call me Dumbo," she says. "If it isn't Irma."
11432112.title: Two Elephant Girls

114321121.content:
Irma spots Ivy and gives a look of surprise before the Asian elephant anthro stomps forward towards your friend's Afrrican elephant girlfriend. She seems really happy to see Ivy. "Ivy," says Irma. "I never thought you'd leave Zoonova." "Look who's talking Irma," says Ivy. "Since when are you interested in Earth?" Ivy and Irma walk up to each other, shake each other's trunks and bump their enormous hips against each other. "Yo Irma!" yells Kevin up to this second elephant. "Remember me?"

Irma looks down and lowers herself to yours and Kevin's level. "Hi Kevin," she says. "So Ivy hasn't dumped you yet? Ivy, I still can't believe you're dating a human. He's so small, he could live on you." "Hey," says Ivy. "Don't knock until you've tried it girlfriend." It was at this point the two elephant girls' duel stomping knocks you off your feet and then the Asian elephant girl, this gray skinned big beauty looks down and spots you. "Oh," she says. "I didn't know you had company."

"Irma," says Kevin. "This is my friend Alan." Irma lowers her trunk and places it right in front of you. "Not again," you mutter. "Oh well." You walk into Irma's nose and then Irma lifts up her enormous trunk and takes you in front of her face. "Uh hello." You say nervously as you wave at Irma. Irma lets out a sigh. "Don't tell me you're afraid, you've already spent the day with this big girl." Ivy trumpets again and nods her head. You decide to change the subject and fast, although being around two girls who were titanic even for anthros was a little unnerving and then you notice Irma's bright blue eyes. "What beautiful eyes," you say. "Like blue moons in the night's sky." Irma actually breaks down laughing at that and you trumble down into her large trunk, forcing yourself to grab hold of a nose hair.

"Flattery will get you nowhere kid," says Irma. "But any friend of Ivy's is a friend of mine. You've got character." "Hey Irma," says Ivy. "Maybe Alan will be your boyfriend." You're actually curious about that thought. You've considered going out with several of the anthro girls you knew such as Lalonde and Betty, but having a girlfriend that made you look like a germ in comparison. Kevin could pull it off, but could you. Irma just scoffs at that notion. "Come on Ivy. How would that work? How do you get it to work? Aren't you worried that you'd step on our swallow him?" "Hey," says Kevin as Ivy lifts him up and places him on her shoulder. "She did swallow me, but I got better. Come on Irma. Just give Al one date." Before you could say anything, you feel Irma's trunk moving around with you inside and you tumble deeper into her nose before she blows you out into her hand. "Well Al, what would you say about that?" You shudder but then you decide it couldn't hurt. "Okay. I'll try anything once."

Ivy and Kevin give a thumbs up as you look up at Irma. Congratulations, you had a date with a three mile high elephant girl.

What do you all decide for your double date?
114321121.title: Ivy and Irma

1143211211.content:
"Hey Irma," says Kevin. "You oughta take that guy into the water. He loves it." "What?" you ask. "Kevin!" "You sure about that babe?" asks Ivy. "Haven't we soaked him up enough?" Before you can say another word, Irma bends over and picks you up with her trunk. "Oh don't worry," she said. "I'll go gentle." Irma lifts you up to the top of her head before Ivy places Kevin on her head as well and then trumpets as she runs towards the water. "You're not gonna beat me this time Ivy!" yells Irma. "Race you to the water." Irma and Ivy laugh as they rush into the water side by side and then both of this elephant women jump into the water and you let out a gasp as you hold onto Irma's hair tight.

Irma and Ivy both proceed to jump into the water and cause a huge tsunami that nearly takes you and Kevin off your respective date and manages to soak the anthro beach goers and make them shake. You hold your breath as Irma takes you under water and then Irma inhales you into her trunk and takes you above the water. You look out the nostrils in awe. You felt like you were staring out a skyscraper in the middle of the ocean. You then turn to see Kevin is performing the same stunt with Ivy's trunk, except you can see Ivy's tusks, something that an Asian elephant like Irma lacks. Irma and Ivy then dive down and you and Kevin are closer to the water and can actually touch it.

"Cool." You say. "Having an elephant for a girlfriend can have advantages dude." Says Kevin. "Whoa. You're saying Irma is my.. my.." You were thinking about that. Maybe Irma could be your girlfriend. She was a beautiful girl if a little, okay, a lot heavy set. Irma and Ivy then raise out of the water and then they put you and Kevin down on their respective shoulders. Ivy then sucks up some water with her trunk. "Oh you better not." Says Irma. Ivy then spews water from her trunk and nearly knocks you off Irma's shoulder. Irma however uses her hand to catch you before you hit the water. "Okay Ivy you asked for it." "Bring it on tuskless." Says Ivy. Irma inhales water and sprays Ivy in the face with the stream and as Ivy lets out a grunt, Irma blows Kevin off Ivy's shoulder. "Kevin!" yells Ivy.

Kevin falls into the water and Ivy picks him and puts him on her shoulder as Irma laughs. "That was a good one Irma." Irma then snatches you with her trunk and brings you to her mouth for a kiss. You sputter as you were just kissed by lips much bigger than your house. Then you see a crystal glow in Irma's eyes as she smiles and flips her hair. You were in love.

"Hey Irma," says Ivy. "I got a score to settle with you shooting my boyfriend off my shoulder." Kevin lets out a laugh. "Come on girls. Don't do something crazy on my account. You're best friends." "Yeah," says Irma. "Unfortunately. So Ivy. What's the game.." Ivy lets out a laugh. "How about we have a little race. First one to reach, let's see who can reach, what's it called Kev..." "England?" "Yeah. Lets see if you can beat me to England." "Huh." Says Irma. "You're on ivory face. Let's rumble." With that both elephant girls swim off at rapid speed. "Hang on tight Alan." Says Irma. "It's a bumpy ride." You hang on and both Irma and Ivy take off at high speed as Kev lets out a laugh. You hang onto Irma as Kevin hangs on to Ivy. You both give each other a determined look as your elephant girlfriends have their friendly race.

Which one of the elephant women reaches England first? Irma the Asian elephant or Ivy the African elephant?
1143211211.title: A Swim with Titans

choices: Stay in England for a while
11432112111.content:
Irma and Ivy swim ferociously creating waves as you and Kevin hold on tight. "Hang on Alan!" yells Irma. "You too Kevin!" yells Ivy. You and Kevin hang on tight as your pachyderm girlfriends go underwater and startle a fishing boat. You then look forward and see a Union Jack in the distance. You couldn't believe it. Even if they were both three mile high elephant girls, Ivy and Irma actually swam all the way to England.

It's a tight race, but Irma manages to swim ahead of Ivy and splash both the African elephant and her boyfriend as she passes and her trunk hits the shores. You're almost tossed off her head but then tumble towards Irma's ear and grab hold of her earring before Irma places her trunk below you to stand on. As Irma gets up out of the water, Ivy is finally able to get up and follow her. Irma lets out a laugh. "What's the score now Ivy?" "Heh," says Ivy. "Don't get cocky. You won one hundred fifty races and I've won one hundred fifty. Still was pretty fun." Kevin lets out a whistle. "I can't believe it," he says. "I didn't think you girls would actually swim to England." "Hey Kev," says Ivy. "Don't forget, I'm much, much bigger than any human on the planet. Come on Kevin." "Oh right. See you later Alan. Ivy has some friends in England she'd like to visit." "Nice meeting you Al." Says Ivy. With that Ivy walks off carrying Kevin on her head in her Mohawk.

Irma then lets out a yawn. "Wow," she says as she holds you up in her trunk. "We went a little far haven't we Alan? I don't know if I feel comfortable this far from Coalton Shores." You let out a laugh. "This is a first for me too beautiful. That, and having a girlfriend I could live on. And such a beautiful gray skinned Asian goddess at that." Irma giggles and leans against the London Bridge. "Oh go on. We've only just met. Well, I think you should decide what we should do. You think us two crazy kids can handle being out of Coalton so far. It's your call Alan."

You think about it. You didn't exactly plan on going to England. Maybe you should head back. You're not exactly prepared for vacation. But then again, how often do you go to England. But then again. You didn't come her entirely by choice. What do you and Irma decide to do?
11432112111.title: Irma wins

choices: "How long have you been in Coalton Shores?"
114321121112.content:
"Well," you say. "Maybe we should head back to Coalton Shores. We're both unbelievably far out." Irma nods her head. "Good idea little man." You then decide to duck into Irma's trunk as your new Asian elephant girlfriend jumps into the water causing a huge wave to wash over London Bridge. Some of the water even goes down Irma's trunk and hits you. "Irma," you say. "Can you try not to cannonball every time you go into the water?" "Any particular reason why not?" asks Irma.

You get nervous and then fiddle around with your fingers. "Well, to be perfectly honest... well... you're not..." You really didn't want to tell Irma that she was too big and heavy because you were afraid of how she'd react but then she lets out a laugh. "Oh I get it. Sweetie, I'm an elephant. Calling me heavy is a compliment." You let out a sigh. "Oh really," you say. "Well in that case, you're the heaviest anthro I've ever met. I'll bet you're even heavier than an anthro whale." Irma lets out a laugh as she continues swimming.

You let out a sigh. "You know, I've never dated an anthro anymore and Kevin is the first person I know to have." "Well, it's mostly humans with anthro girls," said Irma as she performs a backstroke and places you in her canyon sized navel. Dating is okay, but we're still waiting for them to legalize interspecies marriage. But don't worry that won't be far." You blush and take a seat on Irma's belly button. You still couldn't believe you had an anthro girlfriend so soon. Then again, she was very nice and it looked like this would work. Of course, Lalonde and Betty might not like this.

"Uh, oh," says Irma. "Brace yourself." Irma goes underwater and you hold onto her navel as Irma swims underneath a cruise ship. She must not have wanted to get in the way considering that the ship was smaller than one of her toes alone. As Irma comes out of the water you are shot into the air as well and have to grab onto Irma's tail before she swims on her stomach again. "You okay back there sug?" asks Irma. "Uh yeah." You see that you're between Irma's titanic cheeks as you hold onto her tail and immediately climb up and take a nice spot to lay down on Irma's left butt cheek. Of course then you get an idea in your head.

"Uh Irma..." "Yes Alan?" "I was wondering something." "Shoot."
114321121112.title: Back to Coalton Shores

114322.content:
Ivy's trunk takes you and Kevin to the top of her mohawk and Kevin walks out before he realizes something. You're still in Ivy's nostril. "Baby," says Ivy. "Could you tell your friend to get out of my nose. No offense, but he kinda reeks." "Hey!" you yell. "I didn't exactly have time to shower. You think I'm not grossed out being in here" Kevin lets out a laugh. "Come on man, you have got to see this. You shake your head and then Ivy blows you out of her trunk as Kevin catches you.

You let out a look of disgust as Kevin laughs. "That is so gross! How can you stand being in there?!" "Easy, that's how I met her. Mistook it for a cave when I was camping on Zoonova. Now look at this." You look out and you're in pure awe. You can see all of Coalton Shores from up on Ivy's head. She really was big, not just in body shape, but in height. You thought she was three times bigger than a normal anthro upon seeing her, but at this height she had to be at least five or seven miles. "Amazing. This is absolutely amazing. She's titanic even for an anthro." Kevin lets out a whistle. "Hail to the big girls baby." Ivy hears Kevin and lets out a laugh, causing her massive body to jiggle.

However, while Ivy is laughing, you loose your balance and walk forward. "Yo Al! Be careful. You don't know where you're going through Ivy's mohawk. It's beautiful, but it's as thick as a jungle." Unfortunately you just keep moving through the hair as Ivy tilts her head back. Kevin lets out a grunt and grabs hold of his girlfriend's hair but you slip and tumble screaming.

"Alan!" yells Kevin. Before you know it you're in the open air and you're hurdling down fast. You look to see you were quickly descending to the Earth. You should've know it would be dangerous to be at the top of such a huge anthro, especially one much bigger than a normal anthro. Fortunately you find something long and hairy to grab hold of so you don't hit the ground. What did you grab?
114322.title: A Wondrous View

11433.content: What about something with venomous flare?
11433.title: Something with Flare

114331.content:
As you look outside, you look for the source of the footsteps you heard, but then you just see Meena from next door walking by. It was a false alarm. You let out a sigh. "Guess Kevin's gonna be a little late. Huh?" Suddenly you could feel something crawling right behind you. You turn to see what looks like a reptilian tail and then you hear a hissing noise. "I don't like the sound of that."

You look up and look in fear to see a giant red scaled cobra woman looking right down on you from behind your house. She had an hourglass figure despite having no legs and all she was wearing was an Indian sari. She had a ruby on her forehead but no hair being a snake. She lets out a hiss and shows you her large venomous fangs as you let out a scream. You try to run but this cobra lunges her head in front of you and hisses loud showing you her cavernous mouth and street sized tongue. She licks you slightly and you scream again before she lifts you in the air with her tail.

You're scared half to death, you must've run into a hostile anthro. You dread what she has planned for you as she puts her eye directly in front of you and lets out an evil laugh. But then something arises to get this cobra off your back. "Knock it off!" yells Kevin's voice. Upon hearing those words from your friends, the cobra woman places you down on the ground and lets out a laugh. "I wasssn't going to hurt him Kevin," the cobra says as she wraps her tail around Kevin this time. "Just having a good laugh. What happened to fun Kevin?"

Kevin lets out a sigh. "I can be really cool when I want to be Nadia. But I wish you would stop scaring my friends." Nadia lets out a laugh as you confront Kevin. "Kevin! Are you crazy?! That woman is a cobra. I thought she was going to eat me!" "Don't be ridiculous Alan. That's against the law. Nadia, apologize to Alan." Nadia lets out a hiss and slithers down as she reaches out her large finger. You think she wanted to shake knowing full well her hands were much too big for you.
114331.title: Venomously Gorgeous

1143312.content:
You hesitate but you swallow your fear and then you shake Nadia's finger. She then lets out a hissing laugh and shows you those fangs of hers again. "I wouldn't eat a human. The lassst one I had gave me heartburn." "What?!" Nadia then lets out a laugh. "Oh," you say. "That was a joke. You're real mature. Kevin, you have seriously got to rethink your taste in women."

"Are you saying you don't approve of interspecies romance. Besides, you remember Kahri, my ex. She was a total bitch." "At least she wasn't an eight mile long poisonous snake. How do you kiss her with her mouth full of venom?" "Don't worry," said Kevin. "I always kiss her on the lips. Nadia then stretched out her tongue and licks Kevin on the cheek before waving her tail erotically. "I have a friend back on Zoonova. Hey Kevin, do you think Virginia would like your friend here."

"I dunno, hey Al, how do giant reptile girls with soft underbellies and razor sharp teeth strike your fancy. How did you first meet." Then Nadia wraps her coils around you and Kevin and you're trapped looking up at the face of a humongous cobra. "Well," she says as she flickers out her tongue again. "It all happened..."
1143312.title: You swallow your fears

choices: You ask Luna why Baxter hates humans
Baxter comes forward in a rage

You actually nod your head a few times as you listen. Reggie's music was heavy metal in nature and you heard some words about the "last door to the apocalypse". That must've been the name of the song but it wasn't exactly clear.

Soon, the music stopped and you decide to clap. It was the wildest sound you had ever experienced. However, it would appear none of them have noticed their little fan had been watching and then Reggie lets out a sigh and the lioness shakes her head. "What was that Reggie?" asks the lioness. "That was weak. I could barely hear myself sing, let alone hear you." Reggie lets out a grunt. "Sorry Maggie, I'm doing the best I can..." The giraffe girl merely shakes her head. "Well, it's your own fault. We're playing so fast, you two barely have time to sing. Can you be anymore hyperactive hyena girl?" The zebra girl nods her head. "And we don't even have an audience." "Calm down girls," says Reggie. "I'm working on getting a gig. And I wouldn't raise my voice to a carnivore if I were you." "What's the point of playing if nobody sees us?" asks the giraffe girl. "Uh-oh," said Maggie. "Watch out Reggie. It looks like they're revolting."

Perhaps you came at a bad time. You know all bands argue and it looked like even anthro bands did as well. Should you talk to them and critique their sound, or should you leave them to deal with their own issues?
1232.title: Front Row Seat

choices: There's a female anthro filling in
There's something weird going on in the store
1233.content:
You feel like watching a movie tonight, but there was nothing good on TV. You decided to go to the video store. However, you stop to realize something, you remember why you don't go to the video store in town too often. There was an anthro there named Ryan, a Siberian husky anthro who worked the front desk. Ryan didn't have anything against humans, but he hated you. You had a habit of returning movies late and he didn't appreciate it. You remember him warning you that if you returned one more late movie, he'd revoke your membership.

There were other people who returned movies late, why should he pick on you? You really hope that he's not there today. He wasn't the only anthro that worked there, but he was the one you didn't want to run into. It would seem that the male anthros didn't like you that much. If it wasn't Ryan picking on you for returning late videos, it was Baxter, that wolf discriminating against you for being a human. Fortunately there weren't a lot of anthro guys in your neighborhood.

You walk in through the human door at the side of the building and take the elevator into the human section of the store. You walk in and hope that Ryan isn't there.
1233.title: The video Store

12332.content:
As you walk in, you see that Ryan is no where in sight and you see something really surprising. There was a temp filling in. She was a female anthro in a similar uniform as Ryan's. She was a collie anthro and a very hourglass shaped one. The first you saw of her was her huge heart shaped rump before she turned around.

"Hello there," she says in a slight British accent. "Welcome to Orion Videos." You try to speak but only sputter at this hot collie. "Say, you look familiar." "I- I'm Ir... No, I'm, I'm uh..." The collie goes to the computer and pulls up your profile. "You're Alan right? According to your profile you returned the last three movies late. I'm afraid this is your last warning. If you return the next one late, I'm afraid I'll have to revoke your membership."

Well, she was speaking Ryan's language, but in a nicer tone. "Wh-Where's...." "Oh," says the Collie. "Ryan's sick. I'm filling in for him until he gets better. I'm Constance by the way." "Uh yeah," you say with a laugh. "And I'll be off to pick up a movie now..." You almost walk off the table before Constance puts her paw in the way and directs you to the human section of the movie store.

You couldn't believe it. Ryan's replacement was as hot as Vixie if not hotter. Back to why you came in. What section of the video store are you looking for?

I felt a powerful earthquake behind me.

Meena normally doesn't ask me to help her due to the sheer size difference between the both of us, but she seems like she could use some help. I approach her house and rang the doorbell, but I didn't hear her coming so I rang again. After a few minutes of waiting, i wonder if i should wait for her to answer or just go under her door, she doesn't mind.
